title: Darius Skin Design - Reaper Darius!
body:
**What up!
**
This [skin design](http://i.imgur.com/a9kURDT.jpg?1) was HEAVILY BASED on Thanotos from Smite {{summoner:11}} .
The wings change whenever you upgrade your ult, but it's not completely agree upon.

Please leave your criticism and ideas in the comments (EVERYTHING IS APPRECIATED)!
Please vote on the poll as well!

replies.body: The wings (and other features) should spread out (or appear) when the summoner has pushed his ult
uhhhh wat. I dont get it why bring it up?
uhhhh wat. I dont get it why bring it up?
